name: Automatic Work Inc.
description:
Concept 

--- In a world where appearance is everything and automatons seem to have replaced workers in their laborious task, everything works perfectly, although, the illusion was solely to ease our conscience and to claim this technological revolution as truly perfect! But deep down in the ghetto there lies "YOU" a line worker who needs to keep assembling automatons relentlessly with the help of his dashboard in order to keep up with his daily quotas. Of course, when you don’t meet them or when you fail too many times you lose your jobs…and maybe more…After all isn’t it supposed to be robots working here? ---

Features

Follow the rules of your new environnement of work using your controller (keyboard or THE SUPER WORKER BOARD) and enter the good inputs to work and build the robots that are gonna steal your work (only in appearance of course)

How to play

In the game you must follow some instructions that are show in the HUD with the usage of Sprites that correspond to the inputs that are on the controller and press the inputs physically on the controller as if he was really the worker. To progress in the game you must press the inputs in the correct order that is show on the top of the screen and if the player do with success the input in the correct order, 1 robot is build Otherwise if the player is wrong in 1 input he lose a life and if his 3 lives disappear the player lose and if the player is too slow to build all the robots he also lose.
